text: Christopher Alan Broderick (born March 6, 1970) is an American musician. He is best known for having been the guitarist for American thrash metal band Megadeth. He also played the guitar and keyboard for power metal band Jag Panzer. From 2001 to 2003 he played guitar for Nevermore while they were on tour. He played with them again from 2006 to 2007. He is now the main guitarist for Act of Defiance, a band he made with Shawn Drover. Broderick also joined In Flames in 2019 as a touring guitarist. == Bands == * Jag Panzer 1997–2008 * Nevermore 2001–2003, 2006–2007 (live member only) * Megadeth 2008–2014 * Act of Defiance 2014–present * In Flames 2019–2022 (live member only) == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Megadeth members
